resources.string: Shared Element Transitions are a great way of implementing Material motion and adding some flair to your app. Shared element transitions help the user on their journey through your app by giving them a focal point as they go from screen to screen. They can make your app feel like a whole, rather than a bunch of separate screens slapped together. They shouldn't be abused though, in some case too many elements darting all over the screen may make the user feel a bit motion sick!
